src_original: tad yathā /  kaścit puruṣaḥ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamâṇurajaḥsamān  lokadhātūn abhikramitukāmaḥ syāt /  sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇâdhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet /
sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu pu-  nar aśītiṃ yojanasahasrāṇi pratyākṛṣya pratyudāvartyêti /
tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenâtikramitum /
yāvad anabhilāpyânabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum  atikramitum /
evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ /  na dhārayati /
śrāvakayānīyān sevate /  taiś ca sārddhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svâdhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati /
sa tena dhanvaprajño bhavati so 'nuttarajñānamārgāt  pratyākṛṣyate pratyudāvarttyate /
yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanâtaḥ prajñêndriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate /
